  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"object_id":"01J4EXD5MM60CX4YNYN0DEE3Y1","object_type":"organization","relation":"can_view"}}},"schema":{"properties":{"object_id":{"description":"The ID of the object to check access for","example":"01J4EXD5MM60CX4YNYN0DEE3Y1","type":"string"},"object_type":{"description":"The type of object to check access for, e.g. organization, program, procedure, etc","example":"organization","type":"string"},"relation":{"description":"The relation to check access for, e.g. can_view, can_edit","example":"can_view","type":"string"},"subject_type":{"description":"The type of subject to check access for, e.g. service, user","example":"user","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"AccountAccessRequest"}}}}}

</RequestSchema>
